timeline.message: Add partition spec update class for partition spec evolution.

timeline.author: aokolnychyi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -501,7 +501,7 @@ public void testNewTableMetadataReassignmentAllIds() throws Exception {
 
     PartitionSpec spec = PartitionSpec.builderFor(schema).withSpecId(5)
         .add(3, 1005, "x_partition", "bucket[4]")
-        .add(5, 1005, "z_partition", "bucket[8]")
+        .add(5, 1003, "z_partition", "bucket[8]")

replies.bodyText: The intent is to check whether the IDs are reassigned. The spec builder may reject duplicate IDs.
replies.author: rdblue
